children.text: The reinforcing steel has been installed close to, or touching the vapour barrier membrane, which is in contact with the ground.
It is a requirement of section 5.3.2 Reinforcement of AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings, that
‘Reinforcement in rafts and slabs shall be placed with minimum concrete cover of 20mm to an internal surface’ .
The reinforcing steel in these areas will need to be rectified to provide the correct concrete coverage prior to any concrete being poured.
